definition.name: get-vcpkg
definition.description: Run vcpkg to build C/C++ dependencies and cache them automatically.
definition.author: Luca Cappa https://github.com/lukka

inputs.name: vpkg_root_path
inputs.description: Specify a directory where vcpkg is already installed.

inputs.name: vcpkgjson_path
inputs.description: Specify the full path to vcpkg.json.

inputs.name: appended_cache_key
inputs.description: This value is added to the precomputed key used to restore/save the cached artifacts produced by vcpkg.

inputs.name: build_command
inputs.description: The full command to build, e.g. cmake -S ./src -B ./build && cmake --build ./build

outputs.name: cache_key
outputs.description: The key of the newly created cache entry.
